reviews.content: Doesn’t work on both iPhone and iPad, nothing showed up, not even the icon on lock screen.
Working. iPhone XS Max, iOS 13.5 Unc0ver.

Didn’t work at first but now on unc0ver 6.0.2 it works flawlessly. Fantastic tweak. The fact that Apple hasn’t implemented this in iOS already is crazy. It also works with YouTube Music and most other music apps so that’s great!
